definition: firmly-based/steady/steadfast/to have peace of mind/free from anxiety/Taiwan pr. [ta4 shi2]
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy/steady and serious character

sentences.english: The Ecraft workh element of Taurus can leadvertisement to strength mainly because well mainly because desire for solid ground form and structure.
sentences.chinese: 土相星座的特質讓金牛座祈望並具有腳踏實地的能力。

sentences.english: To think rich oneself have to step to work dependably and on the spot.
sentences.chinese: 要想有錢就得自己踏踏實實地工作，。

sentences.english: The others also seemed to have relatively restless sleep.
sentences.chinese: 其他幾頭也似乎顯得睡得很不踏實。

sentences.english: Can have two whole days every week to crawl on the checkers without disturbance.
sentences.chinese: 一個禮拜可以有兩天時間在家踏踏實實地爬格子。

sentences.english: While couching on my comfortable bed, I can have a sound sleep.
sentences.chinese: 躺在自己舒適的小牀上，睡得特別踏實。

sentences.english: The Earth element of Taurus brings strength and the desire for solid ground form. and structure.
sentences.chinese: 土相星座的特質讓金牛座渴望並具有腳踏實地的能力。

sentences.english: The nature of modest from your personality will enable you easily get over of troubles.
sentences.chinese: 踏實穩重的性格讓你在遇到困難時也能沉着應付。

sentences.english: Pursuit made excellence, aspiration achieved eminence, unpretentious soared practicality, responsible humbled integrity.
sentences.chinese: 追求卓越，志存高遠，踏實做事，誠信爲人。

sentences.english: At times youll feel very ungrounded.
sentences.chinese: 您時常會感覺非常不踏實。

sentences.english: But they are doing their small business seriously.
sentences.chinese: 但他們都在踏實地做自己的小買賣。

sentences.english: You'd better stop building castles in the air and get down to some practical work.
sentences.chinese: 你最好不要再作種種空想，該踏踏實實做些事了。

sentences.english: This actually stands between us and peace of mind and restfulness.
sentences.chinese: 它確實存在於我們和踏實與寧靜之間。

sentences.english: It’ll help me return to the world of Doing again.
sentences.chinese: 它將使我重新回到踏實做事的世界裏。

sentences.english: Thank god this thug has finally come back down to earth.
sentences.chinese: 感謝上帝，這狂徒終於腳踏實地。

sentences.english: You think to reassure me when you say that, Maximilian.
sentences.chinese: 你說這句話是想讓我覺着踏實嗎，馬西米蘭？

definition: to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy/steady and serious character
to live one's life/to pass one's days/to get along
